header.title: Online users
header.description: Monitor active sessions in real time with filters for account, IP, and activity.

guard.title: No access
guard.description: {code} permission is required to view online users.

selection.summary: {count, plural, one {# user selected. Bulk logout is available.} other {# users selected. Bulk logout is available.}}

state.error: Failed to load online users. Please try again later.
state.emptyDescription: No active sessions right now. Refresh later to see the latest activity.

detail.title: Session details
detail.error: Failed to load session details. Please try again later.
detail.empty: Session not found. It may already be offline.

description.selected: Force logout the {count} selected {count, plural, one {user} other {users}}?
description.empty: Select at least one user before running bulk logout.

description.generic: Are you sure you want to force logout this user?

toast.batchSkipped: {count, plural, one {# user was skipped due to missing session identifiers.} other {# users were skipped due to missing session identifiers.}}
toast.batchError: Bulk logout failed. Please try again later.
toast.forceSuccess: The user has been forced offline.
toast.forceError: Failed to force logout the user. Please try again later.

errors.missingBatch: No valid sessions were found for the selected users.
errors.missingIdentifier: Missing session identifier. Unable to continue.
errors.missingDetail: Missing session identifier. Unable to load the session details.
